cs3500.music.view

Class AudioView

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3500.music.view.AudioView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompositionView, java.util.EventListener, javax.sound.midi.MetaEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeView

    public class AudioView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICompositionView, javax.sound.midi.MetaEventListener
    The class implements a MIDI playback view of a composition.

    • Field Summary
